EdgeCaseAnnotations.description: Incorrect constructor name allows anyone to call IamMissing function, setting themselves as the owner.
EdgeCaseAnnotations.risk: Unauthorized access control due to incorrect constructor setup.

CommonAttackPatterns.description: Access control vulnerability: IamMissing function can be called by any user, allowing them to become the owner.

RecoveryMechanisms: None. The contract has no mechanism to address misassigned ownership.
